choices: Call your parents back and let them know you can't do it
1.content:
Growing up you thought that you had met all of your family at all the various gatherings, but yesterday, your parents called you.

"Hey kiddo! We know you might be busy, but we're worried about a family member. You have a great uncle, and his estate is pretty close by to where you're at right now. We never told you about him because he was a bit of an odd duck. Any-who, we're concerned for him. We haven't heard from him in years. We'd like you to try to do a wellness check. We'll text you the address and security codes he gave us the last time we spoke. Hopefully they'll still work. If you don't feel comfortable about trying to visit him, just call us back and let us know. Love you kiddo! Bye!"

As you exited the voicemail of your phone you decided to think about your parents' request.

Should you check in on this never-before-heard-of great uncle?
1.title: Getting on your way...

1111212111111112212.content:
Unbeknownst to you, Mike had been in an accident on his way home from the park. He hadn't died, but had instead incurred a terrible brain trauma. He had, in fact, forgotten most of his lifetime worth of memories.

As time passed, his sister had helped him to cope and recover most of his memories, but he couldn't recall why he had lost touch with his friend. The only link he could find was a giant statue he had made in the park. Whenever he saw the statue, he'd think of you, never understanding why.

Eventually, once he had recovered enough and made his way in the world as a sculptor, he returned again to his old college.

20 years had passed since he had last been there, and to mark the occasion, he decided to gild his first and most famous sculpture he had ever officially made.

http://pinkplankton.com/wp-content/uploa...

Another 57 years had passed by the time Mike's life was nearing an end. As an old man, he slowly made his way to the statue.

"I'm sorry old friend. I'd forgotten so long ago, there's no way to fix what's been done. I remember now though. I hope you can forgive me. I've heard you might be re-labeled as The Statue of the Goddess of Lust. Apparently, those young enough to feel it can feel an aura of pure lust around you. If that's true, then I'm sure you're happy as you are. Goodbye old friend."


_______


Nearly a century later, teens and young adults alike visit The Statue of the Goddess of Love in hopes that she will bless them, though some just go to feel aroused. Her aura can be felt for miles now, and she keeps growing more powerful.

111131121321112.content:
As you passed the headless doll, you started to smell something like burnt plastic or rubber. Searching for the scent, you found a radiator nearby, and a puddle of hot, flesh colored rubber and a pair of half melted plastic eyeballs. The hair seems to have shriveled and melted completely into a charcoal mess.

You turned off the radiator for fear of a fire hazard. It's a wonder the place hadn't caught on fire already.

You remembered there being some spare heads in that initial display room. Maybe one of those would suit the doll?

Of course, nothing said the doll had to be put back together right?

You could always check something else in the lab...

Fire hazard taken care of, you begin to look around the lab some more. That's when you notice a wall covered in various small panels. You can see that all of them are labeled with an alpha-numeric pairing coordinate (i.e. A-Z down side, 1-26 along the length). There doesn't appear to be a way to open them from here though, no handles or buttons.

Oddly, there does appear to be one that is slightly ajar.

Submission bands

111131121321323.content:
The video started, pointed at the chamber setup across the lab, but suddenly swung around to face the computer chair.

Sitting in the chair was a young woman wearing tattered clothing that was seemingly fusing/disappearing into her body.

"It has now been approximately minutes since I accidentally activated the chamber while inside it. I seem to slowly be taking on the form of the test subject from chamber 1. I am already observably lighter than I was as previous, and my dermis appears to be attaining the properties of the composite material that the test subject is fashioned from. I can already feel my movements slowing as my muscles and bones also adjust to the format of the internal structure of the subject."

As her clothes finished disappearing, she glanced to the machine.

"Unfortunately, if my assumptions are correct, I will likely lose all mobility within the next hour or so. I need to find a way to slow, or reverse the changes."

Her arm squeaked as she adjusted the camera.

"If you are watching this, please find a way to return me to my natural state. I... aaaammmm....", her voice slowed as her jaw squeaked. She tried to stick her tongue out a little, but her mouth froze like that. As quickly as she was able, she ended the recording.

You looked to the floor where the doll lay. Picking her up and straightening her out, she definitely looked like the girl from the video.

https://e-hentai.org/s/47c4327fd1/131814...

Still, it's impossible for a person to just be turned into a doll... right?

This is intriguing as my current form has no nervous system nor brain. My vision seems to have stayed at previous levels, but my sense of taste is most odd.
When the intruder adjusted the shape of my head, I was able to taste his hands from the tongue component inside the vacant space now within my head. Oddly, I was also still able to maintain all sensation even when my head was detached.

As to why I seem to have regained mobility, further testing will be needed. If my hypothessssssssssssssssssssiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiisssssssssssssssssssssssssss iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii"

1112.title: Nothing happened...

11122.content:
You see a wild eyed scientist with crazy hair and lab coat.

"Well? Are you coming in?" he says in an impatient tone.

As you begin to step forward, he immediately spins about-face and stomps off into the house, obviously expecting you to follow.

As you catch up to him, he starts to explain.

"I've been waiting for your damn agency to send me a new one of you guys since that last one stopped showing up!"
11122.title: "Finally!"

111221.content:
As he continues to storm through the hallways, you see him grabbing miscellaneous objects from the tables along the hall and start assembling them.

"Whatever you do, only touch what I tell you, when I tell you. Understand?"

You nod as the two of you enter a large room.

"Now go sit in that seat over there." He motions to a large chair that almost seems reminiscent of "The Thinker's" chair from The Flash TV show, except this one isn't flying.
111221.title: Let him continue

As soon as you sit down, the chair clamps down on your arms and legs.

"Alright, prepare for the 1st test of the..."

11122111.content:
As soon as he finishes the sentence, and before you can react, it suddenly feels like all of your nerves are on fire! Then, just as abruptly, it turns to silence and darkness. You can't even feel anything anymore.

In the dark void, after what seems like an hour, a booming voice calls out, "SELECT YOUR AVATAR!"

...


...


Uh... how? You can't see or feel anything. So how is that supposed to work?

...


...


After an even longer time, the voice calls out again, "NO SELECTION MADE. PROCEEDING WITH RANDOMIZED AVATAR!"

Moving to sit up, you find that the sheet is rather scratchy and cheap; obviously made of cotton with a low thread count. Flipping the sheet off, you find yourself dressed in...
1112211112.title: In a more rustic bedroom

11122111121.content:
Startled to be wearing a nightgown, you jump from the bed, only to fall to the floor when you foot catches the sheet on the way out.

A moment after you hit the floor with a *thump*, you hear an older woman call out, "Anna? Are you alright in there?"

"I'm alright," you respond, "just missed the floor with my feet."

"Alright, breakfast will be ready in a few minutes."

Getting up, you pull the nightgown off and finally take stock of your current form.


...


Yup, definitely a woman. not only that, but you are also...
11122111121.title: A nightgown

11122111121111.content:
Putting on the mage garb, you quickly realize that the technology of the world is pretty low, at least in the standards of undergarments. In fact, it would appear that what you were wearing when you woke up was it.

https://sta.sh/0osuvdixe3p

Quickly moving to don the rest of the outfit, you hoped that it at least gave some better coverage.With seemingly practiced movements, you quickly found yourself wearing your new costume. Unfortunately, it would appear that it didn't cover much more. The simple act of sitting down could cause issues if someone looked your way.

https://sta.sh/02g2a0qf8l9a

Now being finally clothed, you felt a bit more relieved and less embarrassed about the morning and finally left the room. Leaving the room, you noticed as you walked that you appeared to be in a sort of sleeping quarters. Upon reaching the common area, you realized that it was actually an orphanage.

Seeing the children eating already, you headed over to the kitchen, only to be stopped in the doorway by a middle-aged woman.
"Ah, nope! This is your last morning here before you head out into the wide world, at least let me your breakfast."

Feeling a little lonely about her statement, you head over and sit at an open spot at the table. Watching the woman who raised you fetch your final meal at home made you a little teary-eyed.

Wait... that's not right...right? Focusing for a moment, you realized that the game seems to have inserted some memories into your brain to ease your transition into the world. The random character assignment is probably what gave you your backstory as well as your new body. You quickly find it rather easy to suppress any newfound feelings coming from these memories, if you choose to...

After finishing your rather hearty breakfast, you made your way to the entrance of the orphanage and saw your mother, er Agatha, no... the lady who ran the orphanage. Maybe suppressing these feelings/memories will be easier away from home, GAH! here!.

After giving you a few silver and some advice to sign up at the adventurer's guide for an ID, you left on your new journey.

Upon entering the guild, you are able to quickly find the receptionist and request an ID. After a bit of paperwork and a brief explanation of quests and ranks,and checking your pouch to find you have only enough money for 2 nights at an inn, you head out for your first quest.

Your party is going to find out what happened.

111221131133112.title: You hear giggling behind the woodpile

1112211311331121.content:
http://n6.femjoy.com/free/114685_izf518_...

Donning the dress, you begin to here moaning from where you previously heard the giggling... Yup... Someone's doing the deed.

Looking around, you also spot some jewelry and sandals. Maybe you could sell the jewelry later on, so you decide to...
1112211311331121.title: Don the dress

11122113113311211.content:
Taking the last few items, you high tail it out of there and put it on after you're a safe distance.

Wandering into town, you notice that all of the signs are in a foreign language (foreign to you at least). Waving someone down, you try to ask where you are, to which they reply, "Promiň, nerozumím."

Slightly exasperated, and a little panicky, you try to use gestures to ask if you can use their phone.
11122113113311211.title: Take the sandals and jewelry

111221131133112111.content:
They pull out a smartphone, sign into it, and hand it over. You quickly access the map app and recognize none of the names on the map. Zooming out quite a bit, you realize that you've somehow ended up in Czechia! Zooming back in, you find the name of the town you're in and see that you're apparently somewhat west of Prague.

Fuck...

Stuck in a foreign country, and no language skills to speak of...

You need help...

You decide to try calling...
111221131133112111.title: They understand, and agree

choices: Make your way to Prague (the embassy)
Try to find someone here who will help you...
Try to find a way to get some money...
1112211311331121112.content:
After a few moments of ringing, you hear Mike pick up.

M -Hello?

N- Hi Mike, you're not going to believe me, but this is Nathan. I need help.

A few moments of silence pass...

N- Hello? Mike?

M- *sigh* Forgetting the fact that you're trying to impersonate my friend, when you're obviously a girl. How am I supposed to help?

N- I somehow ended up in Czechia, and I need to get back home. I have no money, and I don't know the language either.

Another moment of silence passes.

M- Are you an idiot? Just go to the American Embassy, they'll get you back home. Sneak onto a train if you have to.

N- What if they find me? I won't have a ticket...

M- Jeezus! Just flash your tits or something! I don't know! Now leave me alone!

With that, he hangs up.

Returning the phone to the person you borrowed it from, you now need to decide what you're going to do...
1112211311331121112.title: Your best friend Mike

choices: Try to get a ticket somehow
11122113113311211121.content:
After performing you best gestures, while managing your skirt in the breeze, you manage to get directions to the nearest train station.

You see that the station is mostly empty, save for the ticket salesman.
11122113113311211121.title: Make your way to Prague (the embassy)

choices: Try to wait out the train ride
Take a look at your new body
111221131133112111212.content:
When you see no-one watching, you sneak into a car on the train. Finding an empty cabin, you think you might be safe from any conductors patrolling for tickets. The door to the cabin was kind of squeaky too, so you should be able to tell when someone comes into the car.

As you start to relax, you realize that its been about 2 hours since you were transported and changed, and you haven't even taken a closer look at your new body! That, and paradoxically, your lower abdomen has had a strange warmth to it even though you have nothing on down below.
111221131133112111212.title: Sneak onto the train

1112211311331121112122.content:
You unbutton you dress and examine your breasts.

http://www.nudeinpublicblog.com/watch4be...

If you had to estimate, you'd guess that they're somewhere in the B range.

Flipping up your skirt, you try to examine your new equipment. Realizing you're not getting a good view of it, you scoot down in your seat, and put you legs up on the mini-table. Yup, definitely a vagina...

After a moment, you notice a presence nearby...

You look up, and it's
1112211311331121112122.title: Take a look at your new body

11122113113311211121221.content:
Staring at him for a minute, neither of you moves.

http://www.nudeinpublicblog.com/watch4be...

Glancing at his crotch, you can see quite clearly that he's getting a hard-on.

Looking back into his eyes, you...
11122113113311211121221.title: A young train conductor

choices: Tell them a bald faced lie
111221131133112111212211.content:
You decide to double down, and hope for the best.

http://www.nudeinpublicblog.com/watch4be...

His eyes widen like saucers, and he immediately runs for the bathroom. 15 Minutes later, he comes back out, and you notice a sizable wet spot on his crotch.

He glances at you, and immediately hurries out of the car.

The rest of the train ride is uneventful, though you do notice the conductor peeking in from time to time.

Arriving at the station in Prague, you immediately head to the embassy.

Upon reaching the embassy, the guards let you into the waiting area.

After waiting for an hour, they are ready to see you.
111221131133112111212211.title: Double down

choices: They tell you you're going home!
They tell you they can't help.
They have an offer that will enable you to get home...
1112211311331121112122111.content:
You tell the officials your story:

About how you last remember being in America...

How you woke up in the middle of nowhere...

How you snuck onto a train to get to the embassy...

However, having no corroborating evidence to back your story up doesn't bode well. The officials debate for a bit in a side room and when they come back...
1112211311331121112122111.title: Tell them the truth (Mostly)

11122113113311211121221113.content: A temporary passport and book a flight?
11122113113311211121221113.title: They have an offer that will enable you to get ...

1112211312.content:
You can't hear or see any signs of civilization, but as your senses come into focus you realize where you are (generally speaking).

You find yourself...
1112211312.title: The wilderness

1112211313.content: As you begin to regain your senses and wake up, you notice...
1112211313.title: Other

11122113131.content: Eh? The sky is wrong? What's wrong with it?
11122113131.title: The sky is wrong

choices: He sees the subject at the site
He see someone, but not the subject at the site
111221132.content:
Success! The subject has vanished! Now to check the landing site!

As the old man turns on the tv linked to the on-site camera for the landing site, he sees...
111221132.title: The test subject is gone (Uncle's perspective)

1112211321.content:
As he is examining the footage, he hears the gate alarm go off again.

"Hrm? Did they send another subject so soon?"

When he reached the door to let them in, he saw that it was...
1112211321.title: No one at the site

choices: The same age as the subject
11122113213.content:
The woman seemed to have an exhausted look in here eyes.

"I 'm finally back!"

As he eyed the woman, he noticed that she was...
11122113213.title: A woman

1112211323.content: The quality of the camera he was using made it a little difficult to discern at first, but he eventually realized it was...
1112211323.title: He see someone, but not the subject at the site

113.content:
You are about to graduate at college. To finance your time and private amusements you have next to your studies you have a job, which is not particularly difficult, but you get paid well enough to be comfortable. You're a total sportive young man and popular with the ladies…

As you look at the address on the phone, you realize you've noticed this place before! It's a large house with a tall gated fence and security cameras all over. You'd wondered for a while what kind of person lived here. Who knew it was family?


As you got up to the gate, you entered the code your parents sent... and...
113.title: Tim (19 year old male)

choices: also the house door is open
1132.content:
The door is already open and you wonder, because you know your uncle as a very shy person and he normally is scared and would never let his doors open. You hope that nothing has happened to him.
You continue your way inside and check the house. So far you only have been in the garden and outside the house.
1132.title: the door is allready open

choices: maybe you better leave this gets to scary
11322.content:
It feels a little bit scary, but since the door is open you enter the house and hope that nothing will be wrong here. Maybe a burglar or intruder here? You hope not to just stumble into a crime scene or something: Once inside the door you see nothing out of normal and proceed your was to the kitchen. Suddenly you heard the door click shut behind you. At that time you noticed that there were odd noises coming from all over the house.

"HELLO?", you yelled out, but no response.

Time to investigate the house...
11322.title: The house door is open

12.content:
After you hang up with your parents, you feel a little more relaxed.

A few days later, you heard that he was fine, but had no time for family any more.

There was only time for SCIENCE!
12.title: End of the line

info.brief_description: Visit your mad scientist great uncle and see what kind of inventions he's created.
info.description:
You've heard very little over the years about your great uncle, until yesterday. Your parents have grown concerned since they haven't heard from him in a few years. They usually left him to his own devices as he's a bit eccentric.

Now they want you to do a wellness check on him at his estate.
